items.name: Electricity
items.body: Professional electrical installations, preventive and corrective maintenance. Specialists in residential and commercial projects.

items.name: Automation
items.body: Industrial automation and home automation systems. Process optimization and smart control for homes and businesses.

items.name: Robotics
items.body: Development and implementation of robotic solutions for industry and education. Maintenance and programming of robots.

items.name: Software
items.body: Custom software development, web and mobile applications. Technological solutions to optimize your business.

items.name: Repairs
items.body: Technical service specialized in general repairs. Fast and efficient attention for emergencies.

items.name: Security Systems
items.body: Installation of security cameras, alarms, and access control. Comprehensive protection for your home or business.

items.name: Equipment Repair
items.body: Technical service specialized in computers, laptops, and electronic devices. Professional diagnosis and repair.

benefitsData.title: Manufacturing Execution Systems (MES)
benefitsData.content: A comprehensive and dynamic system that monitors, tracks, documents and controls the manufacturing process from raw materials to finished products.

items.icon: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 24 24' fill='none' stroke='currentColor' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round' width='48' height='48' stroke-width='2' class='border-secondaryC-orange'> <path d='M11.46 20.846a12 12 0 0 1 -7.96 -14.846a12 12 0 0 0 8.5 -3a12 12 0 0 0 8.5 3a12 12 0 0 1 -.09 7.06'></path> <path d='M15 19l2 2l4 -4'></path> </svg>
items.title: Better Quality Control
items.description: Quality control information is transmitted in real-time, allowing companies to stop production immediately upon identifying a problem. This reduces waste, leftovers, excess, and duplicated work.

items.icon: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 24 24' fill='none' stroke='currentColor' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round' width='48' height='48' stroke-width='2' class='border-secondaryC-orange'>  <path d='M12 12m-9 0a9 9 0 1 0 18 0a9 9 0 1 0 -18 0'></path> <path d='M12 12l3 2'></path>  <path d='M12 7v5'></path></svg>
items.title: More Operating Time
items.description: Generates realistic production schedules by balancing material, human, and equipment resources. Integrates schedules and maintenance to maximize product flow and overall equipment effectiveness (OEE).

items.icon: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 24 24' fill='none' stroke='currentColor' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round' width='48' height='48' stroke-width='2' class='border-secondaryC-orange'>  <path d='M6 18l0 -3'></path> <path d='M10 18l0 -6'></path> <path d='M14 18l0 -9'></path>  <path d='M18 18l0 .01'></path></svg>
items.title: Reduced Inventory
items.description: Updates material records for production, waste, and compliance. Allows purchasing, logistics, and scheduling departments to know exactly what material is available, reducing unnecessary inventory and saving costs.

items.icon: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 24 24' fill='none' stroke='currentColor' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round' width='48' height='48' stroke-width='2' class='border-secondaryC-orange'>  <path d='M17 17h2a2 2 0 0 0 2 -2v-4a2 2 0 0 0 -2 -2h-14a2 2 0 0 0 -2 2v4a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h2'></path>  <path d='M17 9v-4a2 2 0 0 0 -2 -2h-6a2 2 0 0 0 -2 2v4'></path>  <path d='M7 13m0 2a2 2 0 0 1 2 -2h6a2 2 0 0 1 2 2v4a2 2 0 0 1 -2 2h-6a2 2 0 0 1 -2 -2z'></path></svg>
items.title: Paperless Plant
items.description: Eliminates paperwork, reducing opportunities for human error. Recorded data is immediately available across all integrated systems, allowing for real-time decision-making.

items.icon: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 24 24' fill='none' stroke='currentColor' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round' width='48' height='48' stroke-width='2'>  <path d='M8 4m0 2a2 2 0 0 1 2 -2h8a2 2 0 0 1 2 2v8a2 2 0 0 1 -2 2h-8a2 2 0 0 1 -2 -2z'></path>  <path d='M16 16v2a2 2 0 0 1 -2 2h-8a2 2 0 0 1 -2 -2v-8a2 2 0 0 1 2 -2h2'></path></svg>
items.title: Better Genealogy and Tracking
items.description: Tracks the entire production cycle from start to finish, grouping parts or final batches with their manufacturing data. Improves regulatory compliance for manufacturers.

spot.title: TOGETHER, WE CREATE SUSTAINABLE SOLUTIONS
spot.content: We are a team dedicated to providing solutions in automation, IT systems, and the implementation of Industry 4.0.

informacion.title: Who are we?
informacion.content: We are a work team that assists the needs of our clients by providing the technology, tools, materials, advice, and services necessary to deliver solutions according to our clients' needs.

descripcion.title: JIDO-KA
descripcion.descripcion: A Japanese methodology that translates to Human-Centered Automation. It is based on autonomy and intelligent automation, prioritizing the fundamental role of people in processes.

descripcion.title: IKIGAI
descripcion.descripcion: A Japanese concept that represents the reason for living. It describes what gives meaning to our lives, motivating us to find a purpose that makes us feel fully satisfied and happy.

about.mision: To assist the needs of our clients by providing the technology, tools, advice, and services necessary to deliver comprehensive engineering solutions.
about.vision: To be recognized as a company committed to providing comprehensive automation solutions in processes, offering quality, value, efficiency, and effectiveness to our projects.

valores.label: Commitment

missionandVision.title: Our Commitment to Excellence
content: Let's make your goals possible through collaborative innovation. Great ideas cannot be brought to the real world without the collective energy and knowledge of a great team.
At its core, engineering is about using science to find practical and creative solutions. It is a noble profession.

programas.title: Do You Want to Unleash Your Imagination and Creativity?
content: Join our team to open new learnings and possibilities, harnessing your potential.
Toman Jidoka Ikigai is looking for young individuals eager to work professionally in our company.
So if you are enrolled in the 'Youth Building the Future' program, apply for one of our plans.
